abstract: HSBC has confirmed its interest in a takeover of the Korea Exchange Bank in a deal possibly valued at more than 2.5 billion pounds ($5.1 billion), The Daily Telegraph reported Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: HSBC has confirmed its interest in a takeover of the Korea Exchange Bank in a deal possibly valued at more than 2.5 billion pounds ($5.1 billion), The Daily Telegraph reported Tuesday.

headline.main: HSBC May Consider Bid for Korea Exchange Bank
